name: PeopleSoft: Record field based on XLAT should be defined as "Translate Table Edit"
description: Set the "Table Edit" to "Translate table edit" when the field is a XLAT field.
output: Failed checks gives the number of records that contain wrongly defined fields The field name can be found in the value column
rationale: Do not redefine at the record field level the list of values already defined in the field
remediation: Select the record field properties and check that the table edit type is set to "Translate table edit"
total: Number of PeopleSoft Record fields XLAT
